Topic.Title: Dr. Froth's Super IF Search From Hell

Posts.EditableText:
Yes friends... I have created a search engine.  It sifts data from forty sites dealing with IF.  These include blogs, forums, and archives.

Go to my blog at:

drfroth.wordpress.com

Here you can get the details and give it a shot.

Posts.EditableText: What's with the banner picture, it.... scares me.
Posts.HTML: What's with the banner picture, it.... scares me.

Posts.EditableText:
The banner picture is artwork found on the cover of an anthology of H.P. Lovecraft stories.

If you find the picture scary than you probably should not read any H.P. Lovecraft.
Posts.HTML:

Go to my blog at:

I've Used Wordpress for a long time

I make blogs for RPG games like dragonfable and runescape

Go to [url:l5cn7goq]http://forumfinder.wordpress.com/[/url:l5cn7goq]

And please no spamming
I had about 30 spam for adverticing ciggerettes or sending post about going to a s** site.

I'm sure you will learn better
